name: North Water PFD Quick Release Sea Link
description: This short towline attaches, via its D-ring, to any quick-release PFD harness, providing everything you need for a quick tow at sea. For longer tows in open water, where more distance is desired between the boats, extend the line with the a small regulation throw bag.3.6m (12ft.) of sturdy 9.5mm (⅜in.) nylon webbing with a shock absorption system.Paddle carabiner.Built-in flotation.
